>     A mi Lamothe siempre me pareci=F3 medio chanta.

n de que =E9l es el =FAnico que no caga a la gente me

e=EDda, o exagerada, o de cagador. :)

Bueno, malo, azul o gris, la verdad =
que no s=E9. Yo dejo a disposici=F3n de quien pase el dato de que hay algui=
en con quien se puede publicar juegos que no sean gigantescos, sin niveles =
incre=EDbles de burocracia (el hecho de que haya podido hablar directamente=
 con el Ceo del publisher me parece una gran cosa, a=FAn considerando la di=
ferencia de tama=F1os en las empresas).

Dejo un =FAltimo dato de mis conve=
rsaciones con =E9l:

"Yes, have them talk to me directly. And what I mean a=
bout not worth the
time is that game developers think they are going to get=
 rich on a game,
I tell them no, but they still think it, but when I decide=
 to move
forward with a deal, I put myself into a liability since I need th=
e
product on the CD, so if the developer goes nuts, etc. then I am
screwed.=
 I have done this for 26 years, and done publishing for 10, so
this is just=
 experience talking, hence, when I haven't done a deal with
someone I want =
them to know that this is the "value" market, there is
little money and a T=
ON of work to get a game out, so as long as everyone
gets that then I am fi=
ne. I just hate doing a deal then starting artists
on the box, etc. then th=
e developer disapears since he doesn't want to
make 40 hours of bug fixes -=
-- but it has to be done. 

Anyway, what's really easy for me is this. You =
send me complete games in
a single .zip file, one at a time with FTP links,=
 I play the game, I
like, I license, done deal -- simple."

En conclusi=F3n=
: si tienen juegos que crean valgan la pena publicar en bundles y este tipo=
 de cosas, bajo las condiciones que vengo exponiendo en esta thread... adel=
ante, busquen el email de LaMothe en www.xgames3d.com y m=E1ndenle un link =
al juego.

Saludos,

H. Hern=E1n Moraldo

.com.ar/
